description: This is a unit test source file for testing the TriState class, a part of the WPEFramework Core library. It uses Google Test framework to verify the behavior of the TriState class, including construction, setting, and getting its state.

classes.name: TriState
classes.description: A class representing a tri-state boolean (True, False, Unknown) used within the WPEFramework Core library.

methods.name: Get
methods.description: Returns the current enum state of the TriState instance.

methods.name: Set
methods.description: Sets the TriState instance to a specific state, either by boolean or enum.
